title: News24.com | Covid-19 | 'People are going on like there is no crisis' in Masiphumelele in Cape Town
description: "People are going on like there is no crisis," says a Masiphumelele resident. In the area, which is home to an more than 30 000 people, it's business as usual during the Covid-19 lockdown.
content:
Other than the closed shebeens and saloons due to the Covid-19 lockdown, it seems like a normal day in Masiphumelele, Cape Town.
The streets are still full of people milling around, children are playing and some businesses are open. 
The township is home to… [+3045 chars]
